home.title: goulel'hom
home.description: Goulel’hom is a project launched by RAJ Tunisie with the aim of enhancing participatory democracy and enabling citizens to make decisions for a better tomorrow.
home.description_2: Today, you have the opportunity to express your opinion, expose your problem freely, you can also submit your complaint or your petition in order to reach a solution with public institutions.

complains.title: complains
complains.description: Here you can submit a complaint for the public authorities, public transport or municipalities. If you notice abuses or violations of the environment or the collective interest, you can complain and provide evidence such as photos or videos. You can also locate complaints on the map.

petitions.title: petitions
petitions.description: You can submit a new petition or sign a petition.

events.title: events
events.description: Here is the set of events organized by Goulel’hom.

municipalities.title: municipalities
municipalities.description: This link contains information related to municipalities.

reports.title: reports
reports.description: Here are reports about complaints, petitions and related solutions.

home.slogan-2-word-1: The true balance of democracy is not only in election funds but in people's consciousness
